attributes.action: Reinstate Ken Livingstone immediately. He is not an Anti-Semite.
attributes.additional_details: The attack on Ken Livingstone is motivated to stop the discussions on Israel. Reinstate Ken Livingstone immediately as his words were factually correct. Ken livingstone is standing up for the Palestinian people and every call of Antisemitism is an atempt to silence critism of Israel.
attributes.background: Reinstate Ken Livingstone immediately. He is factually correct about zionism. We must not shy away from the difficult debate on Israel/Palestine. Now is the time to have it.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is a matter for the Labour Party.
